attributes.action: ban girls under 16 wearing mini skirts, make up, boob tubes, navel piercings and other peadophile inducing apparel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it embarrasses others to see it, advertises the fact that their parents are woefully clueless, attracts unwanted (or more worryingly wanted) male attention, makes decent men uncomfortable and takes away childhood.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
